action: I want to create new projects and centrally manage members, budgets, and progress
reason: Because I need to visualize project status and prevent delivery delays and cost overruns
acceptance_criteria: The system shall allow only authenticated users with 'Project Manager' role or higher to create projects.
The system must automatically generate a globally unique Project ID.
The system shall require a mandatory Project Name with a maximum length of 150 characters.
The system must limit the Project Description to 1000 characters and sanitize the input to prevent Cross-Site Scripting (XSS).
The system shall validate that the End Date is not earlier than the Start Date.
The system must strictly manage project statuses (Planning, Active, OnHold, Completed, Cancelled) and reject invalid values.
The system shall enforce that the Budget Amount is a non-negative number and adheres to the master currency configuration.
The system must require a valid User ID for the Project Owner.
The system shall support multiple member assignments with role-based checks, strictly prohibiting duplicate assignments of the same user.
The system must maintain a history of member additions and removals.
The system shall allow configuring specific roles for members within the project context.
The system must validate that the Progress Rate is between 0% and 100% and record a history of all updates.
The system shall automatically calculate budget usage and trigger a warning flag if the budget is exceeded.
The system must support logical deletion only, restricted to the Project Owner or Administrator, and record the action in the audit log.
The system shall implement optimistic locking to detect and prevent concurrent update conflicts (version check).
The system must support bulk project creation via CSV import, applying the same strict validation logic as single creation.
The system shall utilize parameterized queries to prevent SQL injection and enforce CSRF protection.
The system must enforce HTTPS (TLS 1.2+) and rate limiting for all API interactions.
The system shall store audit logs in tamper-evident storage to prevent modification.
The system must publish a notification event to an asynchronous queue upon project completion.
The system shall provide an archiving function that makes the project read-only and prevents further editing.
The system must target an API response time of under 500ms and adhere to REST architectural principles.
The system shall ensure all data processing uses UTF-8 encoding.
